header.title: wxPrintDialogData

description.p: This class holds information related to the visual characteristics of wxPrintDialog. It contains a wxPrintData object with underlying printing settings.
See: Overview printing, wxPrintDialog, Overview cmndlg

func.fsummary: Default constructor.

desc.p: Default constructor.

func.fsummary: Copy constructor.

desc.p: Copy constructor.

func.fsummary: Destructor.

desc.p: Destructor.

func.fsummary: Enables or disables the "Help" button.

desc.p: Enables or disables the "Help" button.

func.fsummary: Enables or disables the "Page numbers" controls.

desc.p: Enables or disables the "Page numbers" controls.

func.fsummary: Enables or disables the "Print to file" checkbox.

desc.p: Enables or disables the "Print to file" checkbox.

func.fsummary: Enables or disables the "Selection" radio button.

desc.p: Enables or disables the "Selection" radio button.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the user requested that all pages be printed.

desc.p: Returns true if the user requested that all pages be printed.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the user requested that the document(s) be collated.

desc.p: Returns true if the user requested that the document(s) be collated.

func.fsummary: Returns the from page number, as entered by the user.

desc.p: Returns the from page number, as entered by the user.

func.fsummary: Returns the maximum page number.

desc.p: Returns the maximum page number.

func.fsummary: Returns the minimum page number.

desc.p: Returns the minimum page number.

func.fsummary: Returns the number of copies requested by the user.

desc.p: Returns the number of copies requested by the user.

func.fsummary: Returns a reference to the internal wxPrintData object.

desc.p: Returns a reference to the internal wxPrintData object.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the user has selected printing to a file.

desc.p: Returns true if the user has selected printing to a file.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the user requested that the selection be printed (where "selection" is a concept specific to the application).

desc.p: Returns true if the user requested that the selection be printed (where "selection" is a concept specific to the application).

func.fsummary: Returns the "print to" page number, as entered by the user.

desc.p: Returns the "print to" page number, as entered by the user.

func.fsummary: Returns true if the print data is valid for using in print dialogs.

desc.p: Returns true if the print data is valid for using in print dialogs.
This can return false on Windows if the current printer is not set, for example. On all other platforms, it returns true.

func.fsummary: Sets the "Collate" checkbox to true or false.

desc.p: Sets the "Collate" checkbox to true or false.

func.fsummary: Sets the from page number.

desc.p: Sets the from page number.

func.fsummary: Sets the maximum page number.

desc.p: Sets the maximum page number.

func.fsummary: Sets the minimum page number.

desc.p: Sets the minimum page number.

func.fsummary: Sets the default number of copies the user has requested to be printed out.

desc.p: Sets the default number of copies the user has requested to be printed out.

func.fsummary: Sets the internal wxPrintData.

desc.p: Sets the internal wxPrintData.

func.fsummary: Sets the "Print to file" checkbox to true or false.

desc.p: Sets the "Print to file" checkbox to true or false.

func.fsummary: Selects the "Selection" radio button.

desc.p: Selects the "Selection" radio button.
The effect of printing the selection depends on how the application implements this command, if at all.

func.fsummary: Sets the "print to" page number.

desc.p: Sets the "print to" page number.
